results.title: Simvastatin Inhibits Brucella abortus Invasion into RAW 264.7 Cells through Suppression of the Mevalonate Pathway and Promotes Host Immunity during Infection in a Mouse Model
results.text_hl: Therefore, @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ is a potential candidate for studying alternative therapy against animal @<m>DISEASE_Brucellosis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D002006 @@@brucellosis@@@.
